text: Nancy Robertson (born 1949) is a diver from Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada. She competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City and at the 1972 Summer Olympics Munich, with best result being 7th in platform diving.Nancy Robertson sports-reference.com (Retrieved on 6 December 2008) She won a gold medal at the 1971 Pan American Games, platform diving. She won a silver medal at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games. ==References== Category:Canadian female divers Category:Olympic divers of Canada Category:Divers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Divers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Saskatoon Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Divers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Canada Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Canada Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in diving Category:Pan American Games medalists in diving Category:Divers at the 1971 Pan American Games
title: Nancy Robertson (diver)
